entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
